title: Vegas Baby (w/ Dan St. Germain, Kareem Green & Richelle Ryan)
description: Jay and Dan are back from Vegas and talk about their dad bods, picking up girls poolside and more in Sin City. Guests Dan St. Germain and Kareem Green talk about awful movie bio pics with the bonfire hosts. Richelle Ryan talks about helping the youth movement in the porn industry.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
